item.title: Software Development Cycle
item.description: This is an assignment question I had for my Design Patterns and Software Testing class. Problem: You are given a project that is going to be used in a high school with 400 students. The application will store the student specifications along with the courses they take and corresponding marks into a database and applies some calculations for each student and each class. For example, the average of the marks of a specific course in a class, the number of failed students in a subject in a class, etc.
